The Game Developers Are In The US! Tell Them What Think!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): The Game Developers Are In The US! Tell Them What Think!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 15, 2000 - 09:39 am:

Over at Tecmoinc.com's board, in the MR2 section, Michelle has started a message thread entitled, "MR3: The Official Post". She states that the developers are there for a short period of time, and to post your ideas for MR3!

By Petit-Trot on Wednesday, November 15, 2000 - 10:30 am:

You mean they haven't finished it yet?

By Farmer Jimbo on Wednesday, November 15, 2000 - 11:03 am:

They either haven’t finished it, or are still working on the American/English version.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 15, 2000 - 11:59 am:

It's slated for release in Japan in the spring, so most of the basics are already in place. But, you never know! At least it's a chance to tell them what you think! Perhaps they will use some suggestions in MR4...

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 16, 2000 - 09:19 am:

Special thanks to torey for going through the MR3 threads here and reposting some of the best, most popular ideas, at the tecmo site! If anyone else hasn't posted over at Tecmo, hurry up! They're only in town a couple of days!
